caption: Two men have an argument in front of the entrance of a building. Then two men go into the building. They put on blue coats and go upstairs into a room. In the room, the re’s a lady lying on the ground. She has pink coat, pink shoes and pink nails. The men examined her body because she is dead. They examined for a while, and then they start to talk about it. And suddenly, one of them remember something and rush out of the room. He shouts something to the remaining man in the room on the stairs.
